page.title: 06 THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content: Sark runs under the old feudal system, (it has its own laws and rules), the justice of the laws are decided in the court. The court room is the island's Senior School so if the court is called then the children have the day off. Three times a year,the Chief Pleas is held.These meetings are held at spring, Michaelmas and Christmas. The Chief Pleas is a gathering of the island's parliament and deputies who are chosen by the people. Here, any important decisions can be made and improvements discussed.
